it.ncorti.emgvisualizer.myo

Class ByteReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.ncorti.emgvisualizer.myo.ByteReader

  • public class ByteReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class help you to read the byte line from Myo. But be carefully to byte array size. There is no limitation of get() method, so there is a possibilty of overloading the byte buffer.

    ByteReader is useful for handling raw data taken from bluetooth connection with Myo

    Author:
    Nicola
